preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 6g of boron powder using a precision scale.
2. Measure 1g of indium metal and cut into small pieces.
3. Measure 21g of nickel powder.
4. Measure 1g of thulium oxide powder.
5. Combine all ingredients in a clean, dry mixing bowl and mix thoroughly until uniform.
